mapper.select: SELECT B.DT USE_DATE , NVL(A.USE_CNT, 0) USE_CNT , 'Count' IMSI FROM ( SELECT LOG_FULL_DATE , COUNT(1) USE_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LOG_FULL_DATE , FEATURE_NAME FROM IAR_LICENSE_LOG WHERE LOG_FULL_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{toDt}, '-', '') AND TRANS_TYPE = '0' UNION ALL SELECT LOG_FULL_DATE , FEATURE_NAME FROM IAR_LICENSE_LOG WHERE LOG_FULL_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{toDt}, '-', '') AND TRANS_TYPE = '1' ) GROUP BY LOG_FULL_DATE ) A , ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD') + LEVEL - 1), 'YYYYMMDD') DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD') + LEVEL - 1) <= TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{toDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD') ) B WHERE A.LOG_FULL_DATE(+) = B.DT ORDER BY B.DT

SELECT LOG_FULL_DATE, TRANS_TYPE, FEATURE_NAME, FEATURE_VERSION, USER_NUM, HOST_NAME from IAR_LICENSE_LOG where LOG_FULL_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{toDt}, '-', '') and TRANS_TYPE in ('0','1') order by LOG_FULL_DATE, TRANS_TYPE, FEATURE_NAME

SELECT SYEAR || SMONTH USE_MONTH, SYEAR ||'-' || SMONTH TMONTH, 'Denial' GBNM, Max(DENIAL) AVR , '%Used' GBUSED , Max(USED) USED, 'Max Avail' GBAVL , Max(AVAIL)AVAIL FROM PDF_DATA_LIST WHERE 1=1
and SITE_NM in
#{item}
AND LICENSE_NM = #{licenseNm} AND SYEAR || SMONTH BETWEEN #{fromUseMonth} AND #{toUseMonth} GROUP BY SYEAR, SMONTH UNION ALL SELECT SYEAR || SMONTH USE_MONTH, SYEAR ||'-' || SMONTH TMONTH, 'Peak' GBNM, Max(PEAK) AVR , '%Used' GBUSED , ROUND(AVG(0),1) USED, 'Max Avail' GBAVL , ROUND(AVG(0),1) AVAIL FROM PDF_DATA_LIST WHERE 1=1
and SITE_NM in
#{item}
AND LICENSE_NM = #{licenseNm} AND SYEAR || SMONTH BETWEEN #{fromUseMonth} AND #{toUseMonth} GROUP BY SYEAR, SMONTH ORDER BY 1

SELECT SYEAR || SMONTH USE_MONTH, SMONTH ||'-' || SDATE TDATE, 'Denial' GBNM, Max(DENIAL) AVR , '%Used' GBUSED , Max(USED) USED, 'Max Avail' GBAVL , Max(AVAIL) AVAIL FROM PDF_DATA_LIST WHERE SITE_NM = #{siteNm} AND LICENSE_NM = #{licenseNm} AND SYEAR || SMONTH = #{useMonth} GROUP BY SITE_NM, SYEAR, SMONTH, SDATE UNION ALL SELECT SYEAR || SMONTH USE_MONTH, SMONTH ||'-' || SDATE TDATE, 'Peak' GBNM, Max(PEAK) AVR , '%Used' GBUSED , Max(0) USED, 'Max Avail' GBAVL , ROUND(AVG(0),1) AVAIL FROM PDF_DATA_LIST WHERE SITE_NM = #{siteNm} AND LICENSE_NM = #{licenseNm} AND SYEAR || SMONTH = #{useMonth} GROUP BY SITE_NM, SYEAR, SMONTH, SDATE
